amendment.description: Amendment sought to appropriate $2.5 million to re-institute the Office of Technology Assessment (OTA) to help Congress understand emerging technologies and their policy implications.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to appropriate $2.5 million to re-institute the Office of Technology Assessment (OTA) to help Congress understand emerging technologies and their policy implications. Offset by funds from an administrative account within the Architect of the Capitol.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A048) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 217 (Roll no. 255).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Takano.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A048) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 217 (Roll no. 255).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
